casebody.data:
Anthony ROGERS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 25, 2017

Michael W. Brown, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Mitchell S. Brody, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Anthony Rogers' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 120, 165 A.3d 264 (2017), is denied.
